data.name: Facerig Studio for Individual VTubers w/Live2D
data.detailed_description:
In A Nutshell
Facerig Studio for Individual VTubers w/Live2D brings the amazing Live2D Cubism3 technology to the software, enabling hand-drawn avatars that move and behave as if they were 3D while keeping all the aspects that make hand-drawn 2D avatars special.

What is Live2D?
Live2D is an amazing external technology developed by very talented and passionate people from Tokyo, Japan. It allows for 2D artwork to be animated as if it were 3D. With this upgrade Live2D models can be imported in FaceRig as avatars. Use the provided 2D avatars or create your very own (by using the Live2D Cubism 3 Editor - not included) and import them in FaceRig! If you are an artist you'll be happy to know that the Live2D Cubism Editor for creating new Live2D models is available for FREE for individuals or small business entities (as defined by Live2D in their EULA), for both leisure and commercial uses! For legal details (especially if you are a business) please read the Live2D Cubism Editor EULA.
Note that the Live2D avatars do not work with the timeline editor in FaceRig Studio.

How do I create Live2D avatars for FaceRig?
You simply create a regular Live2D model by using the Cubism Editor and tutorials provided by Live2D, and then you tweak it using the FaceRig Studio documentation and import it in FaceRig Studio as a user-made Live2D Avatar.

Find out more about how to create a Live2D avatar for FaceRig Studio Personal here: http://steamcommunity.com/app/571690/discussions/0/1698294337764669916/

Commercial use of FaceRig content that features Live2D avatars
Monetizing strictly the Live2D model files (which are created by you and saved by using the Live2D Cubism Editor) is in no way regulated or limited by us, Holotech Studios (the makers of FaceRig Studio). The only rules you have to obey are those stated by Live2D Inc. on the Live2D sample website and in their EULAs. Those rules also apply to the provided Live2D avatar samples (bundled in Facerig Studio for Individual VTubers w/Live2D), and to new content that you create using the Live2D Cubism Editor.
Monetizing the FaceRig Studio video output that features Live2D content (video files, video streams/feeds, screenshots etc) is subject to both sets of rules and EULA's, (both FaceRig Studio AND Live2D). The FaceRig commercial use limitations are listed in the FaceRig Studio EULA, http://store.steampowered.com/eula/571690_eula_0.

For more information regarding Live2D use for larger companies or live events, please contact us at info[at]facerig[dot]com

data.short_description: FaceRig Studio with Live2D brings the amazing Live2D Cubism3 technology to the software, enabling hand-drawn avatars that move and behave as if they were 3D while keeping all the aspects that make hand-drawn 2D avatars special.
